description: Complete system overview detailing the documentation system architecture, key components, and their interactions. Includes high-level diagrams showing component relationships and data flow.

Detailed documentation of the hierarchical navigation system, including the three-level structure rules, route mapping algorithms, and section alias handling. Contains flow diagrams of the routing logic.
Comprehensive documentation of the document structure validation rules, including level-specific requirements, content/route symmetry validation algorithms, and enforcement mechanisms.

Technical specification of the Table of Contents generation system, including CJK character handling algorithms, slug generation logic, and heading hierarchy rules. Includes data flow diagrams for scroll synchronization.
Documentation of content processing systems, focusing on the spoiler directive implementation, custom syntax handling, and the three spoiler type implementations (inline, block, leaf).
